alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Johnson; Laurel; Magoffin; Owsley; Pulaski (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 10:50AM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain changing to a little sleet and snow. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to three tenths of an inch on higher slopes and ridges and up to two tenths of an inch in valleys. Total sleet and snow accumulations up to one quarter of an inch are possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central, south central and southeast Kentucky. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could become difficult to impossible across the higher ridges. Outside of the higher ridges, impacts will be less but slippery travel conditions and black ice are still possible. The hazardous conditions could impact travel from late this evening through the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Johnson; Laurel; Magoffin; Owsley; Pulaski
